## ComponentTypeRef interface

Captures all information required to instantiate a component based on its type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ComponentTypeRef<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [resolver](./ng-api.componenttyperef.resolver.md) | <code>ComponentFactoryResolver</code> | Optionally a component factory resolver |
|  [type](./ng-api.componenttyperef.type.md) | <code>Type&lt;T&gt;</code> | The actual angular type for the component |
